content:
We are in a sprint planning meeting and @Ceilyn Boyd has encouraged us to move items to the "Release 6.4 Proposals" under "Global Backlog" at https://github.com/orgs/IQSS/projects/34/views/1

That is to say, which issues or PRs would you like to see in 6.4?

Maybe an easy one?
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/10685

UVA was the one who needed the Publish Popup and now is going to a "submit for review" workflow.
So it is important that the depositor - data "author" sees the popup about what they are agreeing to when the dataset is published (which will be published by a curator).

I think looking at https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/9262 (ensuring the multiple license set-up is DataCite compliant for the export) would be great. But considering the scope, there might need to be a meeting or something about it to ensure everyone is on the same page. So, probably not a quick win, but an important one nonetheless.

I also made a wishlist :innocent:

  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/8129
  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/9013
  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/9245
  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/9462
  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9620
  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10612
  • https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9247

Hello and thanks for the wishlist initiative :thank_you:
Here is ours :

  1. Add Source/Server name to OAI-PMH Harvesting clients #10217
  2. Add thumbnail for featured dataverses · PR #10433
  3. Feature Request/Idea: Remove inactive user accounts · Issue #9631
  4. Refactor the OAI code, Step 2 · Issue #8842
  5. API Migration support for DataFiles · Issue #10008
  6. Change Dataverse / Dublin Core mapping to improve OAI-PMH harvesting · Issue #8129
  7. Grant API rights to Shibb group members · Issue #10702
  8. API Update global role + fixed issue with GUI custom role edition · PR #10612
  9. Installing an harvesting protocol parser with Java SPI · Issue #10699
  10. Starting an investigation/SPIKE for Support for Importing and Exporting DCAT Metadata · Issue #1592

Bonus one because communication is important too :wink: : Make README more appealing · PR #10665

I'm rather late to the party but here are my/our PRs (all of them are ready to review/merge):

  • Extension of API {id}/versions and {id}/versions/{versionId} with an optional excludeMetadataBlocks parameter (https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10778 )
  • Update handling of permalink base-url setting (https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10775)
  • Expose export formats in native API (https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10739)
  • fix: insert correct identifierType into DataCite export XML (https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10759)
  • PID reconcile command (https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10567)

I had suggested one issue on the first call. I've had time to go through others' suggestions and some of the dataverse/issues and have more on my list:

Feature Request/Idea: PopUp Notification when submitting datasets for review
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/10685

Allow Admin to override :MaxEmbargoDurationInMonths Setting in API
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/8528

DOIs for Dataset Versions
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/4499
(which I think has been worded on by Oliver)
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/9462

Dataset types:
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10694

Feature Request/Idea : generated zip files naming dependent of dataset (no longer dataverse_files.zip)
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9620

Feature Request/Idea: How to handle excel files with multiple sheets
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/8518
@Johannes D I moved #10775 into the sprint that just started. Right now it's in "ready for review".
@Sherry Lake you'll be happy to know that dataset types (#10694) has been merged. It's just the beginning of the feature, though. More at #dev > datasetType (software, workflow, etc.)
Anyway, again, the sprint just started and this is the last sprint before we release. So there's only so much we can put in 6.4 before it goes out the door. Thanks for all your input!
Thanks @Philip Durbin 🐉! It would be nice if we could also integrate https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10790 into the release, as it fixes some bug related to perma links in exports.
I put it under the "Release 6.4 Proposals" column, at least: https://github.com/orgs/IQSS/projects/34/views/1
